C

chooseFiles(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Choose files button listener.
com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient - package com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
 
connect() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method tells the SSH class to attempt to connect, it returns a boolean to tell if it was successful or not in its endeavors.
connect() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH
Method reads settings data taken from config file and attempts to establish a connection with raspberry pi and returns a true boolean if it was able to establish a connection
CountDown - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
CountDown handles the counting down and reestablishing a connection with the USB device
CountDown(String, UI) - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.CountDown
Constructor creates and starts the count down thread
CountDownInterrupted - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
Thread to handle telling the user that they already pressed the reboot button
CountDownInterrupted(String, UI) - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.CountDownInterrupted
Constructor constructs a thread and starts it
createChannel(String) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH
Function creates a Channel that follows the spec given in the String such as "exec" and passes back the channel

D

delete(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.PathItem
Response to delete button being pressed.
deleteFiles(List<File>) - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method passes a List of File objects to SFTP for it to delete from the USB.
deleteFiles(List<File>) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SFTP
 
disconnect() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method tells the SSH class to attempt to disconnect, returns boolean on how successful it was
disconnect() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH
Function disconnects the connection with the raspberry pi
Driver - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
This class is really the proper entrance point for the rest of the program, all the heavy lifting will be done here.
Driver() - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
 

E

exec(String) - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method passes a String holding a terminal command for the SSH to pass to the USB
exec(String) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH
Method runs command passed in a string

F

fileScan() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Method scans the files on the USB and updates the UI with new entries

G

getAddress() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Method returns IP address of USB device
getIgnoredFiles() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Method returns list of file paths of files to ignore in the UI
getPassword() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Method returns Password used to login to the USB device
getPort() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Method returns Port used to connect to the USB device
getRebootPresses() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Method returns the amount of times the reboot button has been pressed
getUsername() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Method returns Username used to login to the USB device

Method asks the SSH class if the SSH session is connected or not
isConnected() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH

The main() method is ignored in correctly deployed JavaFX application.

P

Custom cell factory for UI ListView with a delete button.

Initialize list cell.

R

reboot() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method tells the USB to reboot and then creates a new SSH and SFTP object to reset them
reboot(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Function handles the rebooting and updating UI
rescanFiles(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI

run() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.CountDown
Runs the threads code

Method runs the threads code

S

sendFiles(List<File>) - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method passes a List with File objects to SFTP for it to upload the files to the USB.
sendFiles(List<File>) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SFTP
Function receives a list of files that want to be added to the remote server, takes in a list of files and puts them on the remote server.
setRebootPresses(int) - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Method sets the amount of times the reboot button has been pressed, this is best for when an reboot button press has been handled.
setStatus(String) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Sets the status message of the UI in the bottom left corner.
Settings - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
Class reads a file and makes the settings accessible to the rest of the program
Settings() - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Settings
Constructor reads file and stores them in instance variables
setUI(UI) - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.MainApp
Sets the UI being used by the program
SFTP - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
Class handles all file transfer interactions and file lists
SFTP(SSH) - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SFTP
Constructor of SFTP class asks for the SSH to create the SFTP link, if the SSH is not working the SFTP will not work either
SSH - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
Class handles the SSH portion such as executing commands and establishing a connection and establishing credentials with the host
SSH(Settings) - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SSH
 
start() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.CountDown
Starts the thread
start() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.CountDownInterrupted
Method starts the thread
start(Stage) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.MainApp
Initial entrance point of the program, sets up UI and the Driver which acts as the intermediary between the classes
stop() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.MainApp
overrides original stop function so when you press the red x it disconnects and unmounts beforehand

U

UI - Class in com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient
Class controls UI actions and anything UI related
UI() - Constructor for class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
 
unscanFiles() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.UI
Method gets rid of all files displayed in the drive view window without taking any action on them
updateFiles() - Static method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.Driver
Method tells SFTP to return a Vector holding all the file names located in the USB directory in a Channelsftp.lsEntry object for more information on Channelsftp.lsEntry please consult the JSCH java docs
updateFiles() - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.SFTP
Function returns an arraylist storing all the files in the storage drive so the UI can use it to provide a UI for deleting files and seeing what's in there
updateItem(String, boolean) - Method in class com.ryanleahy.remoteusbclient.PathItem
Update routine for cell.
